text:
When saving results to a file as XML, JMeter checks if the result has already
been written to a particular file name. This check is not done for CSV, so
multiple CSV entries will be made if the same filename is used in more than one
listener.

The duplicate checking should be extended to the CSV output type (and DB if/when
implemented ...)
creator: sebb@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text:
Fixed (finally):
